MetricDescription: Count of applications in the organization
% of applications that are considered critical by the organization
% of applications subject to risk assessment during the reporting period
Target:
X % or higher, 
 X % higher than previous period, 
 X % increase over a defined period 
 
 Higher is better At least critical applications should be covered in scope
